discoverBlogEntriesData.title: The Self-Care Journey: Wellness Centers in the Philippines

main.description:
The importance of self-care

The concept of self-care has significantly evolved over the years, where it’s no longer viewed as mere luxurious indulgence but also as an important aspect of one’s holistic lifestyle.

In the Philippines, there is already a growing awareness when it comes to practicing self-care. It allows us to look after our mental, emotional, and physical well-being, which are all essential as we go about our daily lives.

Are you looking to disconnect and unwind for a much-needed breather from your daily hustle? Take a deep breath as we walk you through our curated list of wellness center destinations in the Philippines.

 

Boracay

Boracay Island

Beyond its famous clear water and fine white sand beach, Boracay Island offers some of the best wellness center spots. Escape to this relaxing slice of paradise as you embark on a transformative journey, offering rejuvenation and nourishment of the mind, body, and soul.

 

Signature Oils at Terra Wellness Spa at Discovery Boracay (known as Discovery Shores Boracay)

Looking to connect with and be one with nature amid this tropical island paradise? From traditional Filipino therapy to specialized treatments, Terra Wellness Spa at Discovery Boracay will take you on a journey to tranquility and serenity as you reconnect in a sanctuary designed to help you float back to reality at your own pace.

 

Coron

Dimakya Island in Coron, Palawan

How about a transformative experience tucked away in the pristine natural beauty of Coron, Palawan? Situated far away from the fast-paced nature of urban life, Coron carves out a safe sanctuary where you can rekindle the harmony of the mind, body, and spirit.

 

The use of 100% coconut oil at Glow Spa at Discovery Coron (known as Club Paradise Palawan)

Hailing in an exclusive island paradise is Discovery Coron’s very own Glow Spa. Get immersed in an all-natural spa treatment using 100% coconut oil, that will not only soothe your senses but also protect the environment. The resort spa’s partnership with Above Aesthetic Clinic (AAC) pushes for the development of detoxification and rejuvenating treatments that combine Oriental and Western techniques.

 

Sipalay, Negros Occidental

Sipalay, Negros Occidental’s coastal view

Imagine waking up to the soothing sound of waves at a charming coastal destination like Sipalay, Negros Occidental. Amid picturesque landscapes, the island is an ideal sanctuary for those seeking solace and rejuvenation. Sipalay’s rich culture and warm hospitality can turn your getaway into an immersive journey toward finding inner balance.

 

A secluded spot at Linong Spa at Manami Resort

Known as a Sanctuary to the Senses, Linong Spa at Manami Resort is a state-of-the-art healing ground, offering the best fusion of nature’s healing magic and the genuine care of the human touch. The wellness center offers an ultimate sensory experience, where you can enjoy the views of the resort while getting lost in the rhythms of nature sounds and the soothing aroma of signature oils for a relaxed mind.

 

Makati

Ayala Triangle Park at night in Makati City

Amidst tall skyscrapers and the energetic pulse of the city, Makati City boasts hidden sanctuaries that provide an oasis of calm, one where you can soothe and recharge your senses.

 

Hammam Treatment at Terazi Spa at Discovery Primea

Among them is Terazi Spa at Discovery Primea, where a haven of understated elegance and unparalleled wellness services await you. Indulge in a selection of traditional and natural healing therapies. A Terazi Spa signature is the Turkish Bath or Hammam treatment, which makes use of meticulously sourced ingredients that are crafted to harmonize and rejuvenate the body and soul.

Now that you know some of the wellness center hotspots in the Philippines, where do you see yourself going first?

discoverBlogEntriesData.title: Your Guide to a Seamless Travel Experience

main.description:
Whether it’s a solo travel adventure, a romantic retreat, or a family getaway, nothing beats the bubbling excitement of an upcoming trip! While navigating unfamiliar destinations can sometimes leave you feeling overwhelmed, don’t worry! With the right mindset and preparation, you’re on your way to a seamless travel experience.

Join us as we explore essential tips to help you make the most of your trip.

 

Research your destination

Familiarity with your chosen destination is the first step to making the most of your trip. For instance, having a background in the local culture will also give you an idea of what attractions to visit, activities to try, and signature dishes to feast on.

Moreover, being aware of the destination’s customs and traditions will also help in raising awareness about the specific destination’s proper etiquette, including what to wear and how to behave in public. For example, on Boracay Island, wearing light clothing over swimwear when entering establishments is highly advised as a sign of respect for the island’s culture.

 

Create a flexible itinerary

While being spontaneous has its perks, having an outline of your travel plans, such as including your transportation, accommodation, and activities, can help transition you to a smooth sailing journey. It’s best to keep your travel itinerary flexible; it does not have to be something that you have to follow strictly. This will allow you to have more fun than worrying about following your schedule.

 

Maximize your time

A seamless travel experience includes maximizing your time. This will enable you to achieve a full travel experience as you immerse yourself in the destination’s culture, attractions, and activities. Despite the limited number of days during a vacation, the efficient use of your time can enhance the overall quality of your travel experience. This is the perfect chance to fulfill your travel aspirations as you tick off some items from your bucket list.

 

Explore your accommodation options with Discovery hotels and resorts

Choosing the right accommodation greatly matters while you are on vacation. It’s important to find comfort and ease as you relax after a long day of excursions and thrilling activities. Deeply rooted in providing a “Service That’s All Heart,” Discovery hotels and resorts are ready to welcome you to a home away from home. Whether you are seeking a breathtaking beach destination or a vibrant urban oasis, each property is meticulously designed for every discerning traveler.

Have a look at your guide below:

You can make the most of your seamless travel experience with a touch of  ‘Service That’s All Heart’ with Discovery hotels and resorts. For more information, visit our website at www.discoveryhotels-resorts.com

discoverBlogEntriesData.title: Discovery Hospitality Corporation, Crowned as the Leading Hospitality Brand in the Philippines

main.description:
Discovery Hospitality Corporation (DHC) proudly added three more awards to its collection this year after receiving three recognitions at the World Business Outlook Awards 2023 held last November 25 at the Marriott Marquis in Bangkok, Thailand.

The World Business Outlook Awards is a prestigious event led by Singapore-based global media publication, World Business Outlook, featuring industry business updates and providing a global voice and perspective to open conversations that are game-changers. To continue its mission of delivering information with legitimacy standards, this award-giving event recognizes excellence in different industries, applauding both individuals and organizations for their remarkable performance and innovative contributions. These awards highlight top-tier business professionals and industry leaders across the globe.

This event acknowledged the outstanding achievements of DHC as this year’s ‘Leading Hospitality Brand in the Philippines’. Additionally, Ms. Blessy Townes, Vice President and Head of Digital Marketing and Branding, was honored as ‘Hospitality Digital Marketing Leader of the Year in the APAC region’. And with heartfelt delight, Mr. Jose Parreño, Jr., Chief Operating Officer of Discovery Hospitality Corporation, was presented with the esteemed title of ‘COO of the Year in the Hospitality Sector of the Philippines.’

Discovery Hospitality Corporation is a proud homegrown brand managing the Philippines’ best-loved hotels and resorts, namely Discovery Shores Boracay, Club Paradise Palawan, Discovery Suites, and Discovery Primea. Just this year, it opened two new properties: Manami Resort under its new brand called Signature Collection, and Discovery Samal, the first property to highlight the rebranded Discovery Resorts. From purely heading and operating these owned properties, DHC has trailblazed and expanded its horizons to more than just focusing on its own but also sharing its expertise from decades of experience to provide allied and shared services and property management with other businesses, all while continuing to lead its legacy onwards and upwards.

For Parreño, each award attributed to DHC serves as a reaffirmation of Discovery’s goal of achieving excellence. “We take pride in the continuous recognition from The World Business Outlook. These accolades not only inspire us but also serve as a reminder to consistently raise the standards in the hospitality field. Through continuous innovation, our aim is always to provide “Service That’s All Heart” to each and every guest,” added Parreño.

To DHC’s management team, these awards reflect their collective passion and dedication, as well as the exceptional leadership of Parreño and Townes. Every recognition, according to Parreño, “reflects the success of Discovery’s efforts and the unforgettable experience we impart on our guests.”

“Over the years, the definition of luxury travel hasn’t been merely a destination, but now the shift has moved into creating memorable and authentic experiences. By valuing each guest, we ensure they relish every moment of their stay with us, which in turn produces unparalleled service,” Parreño concluded.

Discovery Hospitality Corporation continues to solidify its brand love and remarkable connections to its guest, business partners, and internal stakeholders. It strives to deliver authentic experiences that are true to the locale and build hotel brands that inspire the modern traveler, underpinned by genuine Filipino warmth.

For inquiries on hotel management and digital shared services, contact DHC’s Senior Vice President and Head of Sales and Operations, Cathy Nepomuceno, at cathy.nepomuceno@discoveryhospitality.com. For more information, visit www.discoveryhospitality.com

 

PRESS

discoverBlogEntriesData.title: 9 Indoor Activities to Keep You Busy This Summer

main.description:
Summer is finally here, and though we can’t go rushing to the beach just yet, there’s plenty to keep us busy in the great indoors. We’ve rounded up 9 activities you can enjoy whether you’re safely checked in or staying cozy at home.

 

Dig into your movie bucket list.

Oscar nominees, foreign language must-sees, old Hollywood classics, that documentary on global warming. We all have films we keep saying we’re going to watch but have never actually sat through. Now’s the perfect time to dust off those DVDs or clear out your Watch List. You might even pick up some travel inspo from what you watch!

 

Settle in with a good read.

Remember all those books you hoarded at the fair, posted on your Instagram stories, and immediately dumped on your bedside table? Time to pull a good read off the shelf! Or if you’re looking for something to listen to while cleaning up or cooking, audiobooks are a great way to multitask.

 

 

Try a new recipe.

Speaking of cooking, it’s time to contend with your market haul (shop responsibly, folks!) Look for inspiration from online food magazines, YouTube channels, even your favorite celebrities firing up their stoves and keeping their kitchens busy. Besides, you’re going to get tired of the same pasta recipe at some point.

 

Get moving.

Can’t go outdoors? Not an excuse to not exercise. Staying healthy involves sweating it out too. Download a fitness app, watch workout videos online, or even sign up for the livestream classes that some studios offer!

 

Put on your thinking cap.

Staying indoors shouldn’t keep you from flexing those brain muscles. Learn a new skill or sign up for an online class! There are plenty of free workshops and other resources you can look into that will certify you in a field of expertise over the course of a few weeks.

 

Start planning your next trip.

You don’t have to wait another month before setting things in motion for your dream destination! Pristine beaches in Boracay and Coron are going to be perfect for filling in your wanderlust gap. Try looking at a possible itinerary too so you can prepare arrangements for activities and know who to call as soon as you can. And of course, Discovery Shores Boracay and Club Paradise Palawan will be waiting to welcome you warmly for your summer holiday.

 

Go on virtual tours.

You don’t have to hop on a plane to get your culture fix! Museums all over the world are opening their virtual doors so you can still enjoy exhibits right from your couch. You can also check out plays and concerts streaming online for free!

 

Start a new passion project.

If you’ve always wanted to try your hand at painting or have been keeping that screenplay idea in your notes for years, now’s the perfect time to jump on those! Let those creative juices flow and stop feeling bad about never acting on that passion project. Tend to your garden, start that Instagram account for your pet, make new music–better late than never!

 

Help those in need.

Even if you can’t go out and extend a hand to those in need right now, there are ways to help! Reach out to organizations putting together donations for supplies if you can, stay tuned to the news for updates on areas and industries that need the most assistance, and try to uplift those around you with positivity and words of encouragement!

 

There’s plenty to keep you busy in the weeks to come! In the meantime, stay safe and healthy. We’ll see you soon!
